item.title: About
Links
item.description: Software Alien Blue - Reddit Client Amphetamine - Keep Your Mac Awake Backblaze - Cloud Backups Bear - Markdown / Notes / Web Clipping BetterTouchTool - macOS automation and customisation Brew - Package manager mas - Mac App Store CLI integrated with brew Bumpr - Customise Browser By App or Link Calibre - Ebook Management DaisyDisk - Disk usage inspector Fastmail - Email Handbrake - Video Encoding ImageOptim Beta - Image compression) Note: This is a beta version, but it’s the only version that supports Apple Silicon natively, the author is working on ImageOptim 2 - A complete rewrite.
